freeService.description1: We understand that medical care can be financially challenging. Agency for Patient Care offers a limited program for patients who need assistance with medical expenses.

freeService.priorityText: We prioritize cases involving children, urgent medical situations, and patients facing exceptional circumstances.

aboutGmed.title: About Gmed
aboutGmed.subtitle: A legacy of excellence in healthcare spanning decades of innovation and patient care

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Gmed is committed to inspiring hope and contributing to health and well-being by providing the best care to every patient through integrated clinical practice, education, and research.
mission.description2: We strive to deliver unparalleled expertise and compassion to all who seek healing, making a positive impact on the lives we touch through our dedication to excellence.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We pursue the highest standards in everything we do, constantly innovating to improve patient outcomes.

respect.title: Respect
respect.description: We honor the dignity of every individual, treating patients, families, and colleagues with compassion.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We uphold the highest ethical standards, earning trust through transparency and accountability.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new ideas and technologies that advance medical science and improve patient care.

history.title: Our History
history.description1: Founded over half a century ago, Gmed has grown from a small community hospital to a world-renowned medical center. Our journey has been marked by groundbreaking research, innovative treatments, and an unwavering commitment to patient care.
history.description2: Today, we continue to build on this legacy, combining cutting-edge technology with the compassionate, personalized care that has always been our hallmark.

commitment.description2: From scheduling your first appointment to managing ongoing care, our dedicated team is here to help.

notice.title: Notice of Privacy Practices
notice.description: This notice describes how medical information about you may be used and disclosed and how you can get access to this information. Please review it carefully.

usage.title: How We Use and Disclose Your Information

treatment.title: For Treatment
treatment.description: We may use your health information to provide, coordinate, or manage your healthcare and related services. This includes sharing information with other healthcare providers involved in your care.

payment.title: For Payment
payment.description: We may use and disclose your health information to obtain payment for services we provide to you, including billing and collection activities.

operations.title: For Healthcare Operations
operations.description: We may use your information for quality improvement, training, and other business operations necessary to run our practice and ensure quality care.

items.restrictions: Right to request restrictions on certain uses and disclosures of your information
items.confidential: Right to receive confidential communications of your health information
items.inspect: Right to inspect and copy your health information
items.amend: Right to amend your health information
items.accounting: Right to receive an accounting of disclosures
items.copy: Right to obtain a paper copy of this notice

responsibilities.title: Our Responsibilities
responsibilities.intro: We are required by law to:

items.maintain: Maintain the privacy of your protected health information
items.provide: Provide you with this notice of our legal duties and privacy practices
items.follow: Follow the terms of the notice currently in effect
items.notify: Notify you if we are unable to agree to a requested restriction
items.breach: Notify affected individuals following a breach of unsecured health information

privacyPolicy.lastUpdated: Last Updated: January 1, 2024 | This notice is effective as of this date

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.subtitle: Advanced protection measures to safeguard your most sensitive information

enterprise.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
enterprise.description1: We employ multiple layers of security to protect your health information from unauthorized access, ensuring your data remains confidential and secure at all times.
enterprise.description2: Our security infrastructure meets and exceeds industry standards, including HIPAA compliance, SOC 2 certification, and regular third-party security audits.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest using AES-256 encryption standards.

dataCenters.title: Secure Data Centers
dataCenters.description: Your information is stored in SOC 2 certified facilities with 24/7 physical security.

accessControls.title: Access Controls
accessControls.description: Multi-factor authentication and role-based access ensure only authorized personnel can view your data.

audits.title: Regular Audits
audits.description: Continuous monitoring and quarterly security assessments to identify and address vulnerabilities.

threatDetection.title: Threat Detection
threatDetection.description: Advanced intrusion detection systems monitor for suspicious activity 24/7.

backup.title: Backup & Recovery
backup.description: Automated daily backups with disaster recovery procedures to prevent data loss.

hipaa.title: HIPAA Compliance
hipaa.description: We are fully compliant with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), ensuring the highest standards of patient privacy and data security.

certifications.title: Industry Certifications
certifications.description: Our security practices are validated by independent third-party auditors and meet rigorous industry standards.

training.title: Staff Training & Awareness
training.description: Every member of our team undergoes comprehensive security training to ensure they understand their role in protecting your information.

items.annual: Annual HIPAA and security training for all staff
items.updates: Regular updates on emerging security threats
items.policies: Strict policies for handling patient information

report.title: Report a Security Concern
report.description: If you believe you've identified a security vulnerability or have concerns about the security of your information, please contact us immediately.

hipaaCompliance.title: HIPAA Compliance
hipaaCompliance.subtitle: Our commitment to protecting your health information through comprehensive compliance

whatIs.title: What is HIPAA?
whatIs.description1: The Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) is a federal law that establishes national standards to protect sensitive patient health information from being disclosed without the patient's consent or knowledge.
whatIs.description2: At Gmed, we take HIPAA compliance seriously and have implemented comprehensive policies and procedures to ensure your Protected Health Information (PHI) remains secure and confidential.

privacy.title: Privacy Rule
privacy.description: Establishes national standards for the protection of health information and gives patients rights over their health information.

items.access: Right to access your medical records
items.corrections: Right to request corrections to your records
items.whoAccessed: Right to know who has accessed your information

security.title: Security Rule
security.description: Sets standards for protecting electronic health information through administrative, physical, and technical safeguards.

breach.title: Breach Notification Rule
breach.description: Requires covered entities to notify affected individuals in the event of a breach of unsecured protected health information.

omnibus.title: Omnibus Rule
omnibus.description: Strengthens privacy and security protections for health information and extends HIPAA requirements to business associates.

items.officers: Designated Privacy Officer and Security Officer

items.facilityAccess: Controlled facility access with badge systems

items.policyUpdates: Updates to policies as regulations evolve

questions.title: Questions About HIPAA?
questions.description: Our Privacy Officer is available to answer your questions about HIPAA compliance and your privacy rights.

patientRights.title: Patient Rights
patientRights.subtitle: Understanding your rights as a patient and our commitment to respecting them

intro.title: Your Rights Matter
intro.description1: As a patient at Gmed, you have fundamental rights that guide how we provide your care. These rights are designed to ensure you receive respectful, safe, and high-quality healthcare.
intro.description2: We are committed to protecting these rights and ensuring you understand them fully so you can be an active participant in your healthcare decisions.

respectfulCare.title: Right to Respectful Care
respectfulCare.description: You have the right to receive care that respects your personal values, beliefs, and preferences, free from discrimination.

information.title: Right to Information
information.description: You have the right to receive complete and accurate information about your diagnosis, treatment options, and prognosis.

items.costs: Information about costs and payment options

decisions.title: Right to Make Decisions
decisions.description: You have the right to participate in all decisions about your healthcare and to refuse treatment.

communication.title: Right to Communication
communication.description: You have the right to communicate with your healthcare providers and have your concerns addressed.

items.safeQuality: Right to safe, quality healthcare services
items.privacy: Right to privacy during examination and treatment
items.painManagement: Right to have your pain assessed and managed
items.continuity: Right to continuity of care and care coordination
items.policies: Right to be informed about hospital policies
items.visitors: Right to have family and friends visit
items.transfer: Right to transfer to another facility
items.billing: Right to review your bill and receive an explanation
items.representative: Right to designate a healthcare representative

responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
responsibilities.description: Along with your rights, patients have certain responsibilities to help ensure the best possible care for themselves and others.

items.accurate: Provide accurate and complete health information
items.followPlan: Follow the treatment plan agreed upon with your healthcare team
items.askQuestions: Ask questions when you don't understand
items.respect: Treat healthcare providers and staff with respect
items.appointments: Keep appointments or notify us if you cannot
items.financial: Meet financial obligations for your care

grievance.title: File a Grievance
grievance.description1: If you believe your rights have been violated or you have concerns about your care, you have the right to file a grievance without fear of retaliation.
grievance.description2: We take all complaints seriously and will investigate thoroughly. You may also file a complaint with state or federal agencies.
